notesStmt.note: This oversize item is stored in a map drawer.

msContents.summary: Grant of legitimation from Cardinal Giovanni d'Andrea di Nanni Todeschini Piccolomini, of another individual named Giovanni Piccolomini, who was an apostolic notary. As a result of this grant, the notary, who was the illegitimate son of a subdeacon and an unmarried woman (soluta), was eligible for any ecclesiastical prebend.

msItem.title: Giovanni d'Andrea di Nanni Todeschini Piccolomini grant of legitimation
msItem.author: Piccolomini, Giovanni d'Andrea di Nanni Todeschini, 1475-1537

history.provenance: Formerly owned by Frederick North, Earl of Guilford, and Sir Thomas Phillipps (part of ms. 6067).
